title: Spoiling the Heck Out of Elden Ring
description:
Look, we told you we'd be talking about Elden Ring for a very long time, and here we are, doing just that. We're going to be talking about the game's first half, and then, after a brief interlude, the second half! And then we're gonna talk about it less in the future, probably!

Other media discussed: Sonic 2, Everything Everywhere All at Once, Old Enough, Perfect Tides, Minx
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (Justin McElroy, Griffin McElroy, Russ Frushtick, Chris Plante)
